articles.content:

articles.title: Spencer Dinwiddie makes blatantly illegal vow to sign with team of fans' choice if they raise $24.6 million - CBS Sports
articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie's creative idea is in no way, shape or form allowable under the CBA
articles.content: Spencer Dinwiddie is at it again. One of the NBA's most creative off-court thinkers, Dinwiddie routinely offers out-of-the-box ideas and has even attempted to convert his contract into a security. The NBA rejected that plan, just as it will surely reject his … [+7706 chars]

articles.author: Wale Aliyu
articles.title: Boston study: 90% of the population may not have been exposed to COVID-19 at all - Boston 25 News
articles.description: Nearly 90% of the population of Boston has not been exposed to COVID-19 at all. That is if a Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH), and the Boston Public Health Commission (BPHC) study in four Boston neighborhoods holds true for the rest of the city.
articles.content: BOSTON — Nearly 90% of the population of Boston has not been exposed to COVID-19 at all. That is if a Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH), and the Boston Public Health Commission (BPHC) study in four Boston neighborhoods holds true for the rest of the city.… [+5399 chars]
